info.name: Miracle Snowflakes
info.description: Snowflake, snowflake, snowflake...When I was a kid, my whole family cut out paper snowflakes and pasted them on all windows for the new year. [url="http://s01.yapfiles.ru/files/603603/snowflakes_background_bright_texture_winter_55300_1920x120.jpg"]O[/url]
